评论概述: Shorter than I thought it would be

Dress has a sewn in tag that reads "70% Rayon  30% Polyester.The dress is a least 5 inches above my knee. Hits mid-thigh.  I'm 5'5" and the dress (more like a tunic") is to short for me and only wearable with leggings.I'm keeping it and will wear it with leggings and ankle boots.
I love the dress. It's super cute and flattering. Please enjoy this headless picture of me in the dress. I bought an XL. I am 5'4" and about 170 pounds.

I can see wearing this during a beach vacation maybe....but can never wear this anywhere else!
Love, love, love. Looks great with leggings. Hides all the bumps and lumps.

This dress was exactly what I wanted. I am 5’2 and a size eight. The dress did not show my belly at all. It also was close to knee length, which I like, since I am so much shorter than the model.

This is so attractive and comfortable!  Everything about it is perfect.  I am definitely buying one in another color. The material is cottony and flowy.  The colors are exactly as pictured.  The embroidery is real (so often the pictures are fake - but not in this case).  Yay!  Good purchase!

评论概述: Love this dress so much I bought it twice
评论详情: I have this dress in two different colors. I absolutely love the fit and look. Super comfortable and easy care.

评论概述: Horrible Toxic Smell and Not Cotton!
评论详情: I bought this dress because it is highlighted as being cotton. Unfortunately, the tag lists this dress as being 70% Rayon & 30% Polyester. That is not a deal breaker for me but the other bad part about this dress is the incredibly strong toxic smell that it has. Both my daughter and I noticed it immediately. It's bad. It smells like it's either been drenched in formaldehyde, been hanging out in a car oil business like Valvoline, or from a toxic warehouse. This is for my daughters Christmas Concert and I don't want her to be exposed to these chemicals so it is going back. Why the 2 stars instead of 1?? The dress is beautiful. It seems to have more of an orange color to it instead of the deep beautiful red in the photo of Amazon. Although it's beautiful, the smell is just to strong and I want to protect my kiddo from it.

The embroidery is very pretty so I decided to keep it despite having an odd fit. The upper arms ended up being a bit weird on me, so the whole dress slides up a little when I lift my arms. It’s not the worst case of this I’ve had, but it’s something to keep in mind if you have thicker upper arms. The sleeves are a bit tight in the armpit as well and the chest feels a little bit snug, but nothing terrible. The tightness isn’t very obvious to other people, and I can still wear this without too much discomfort. Unfortunately I did size up to combat the issues I saw in some reviews, but it ended up still being a little tight in random areas.  I have a love/hate relationship with the length too. I have to wear shorts or tights under it because it’s easy to accidentally show too much if you bend down 😅  I do like this dress still. It’s quite different from things I usually see, so I’m going to keep it! Just bear in mind that it may not be the most comfy dress you’ve owned.

评论概述: A new favorite and it's the perfect length!
评论详情: I love the sleeves, the stitching, and the length of this dress. It's comfortable and I love that it's 100% cotton (the sheathe underneath is rayon). I'm 5'3" and weigh 148 lbs. so I got the large. I might've done well with a medium but I like how comfortable and flowy this feels. The length is perfect for my frame and hits just above my knees. I can tell this will be a new favorite in my wardrobe.
Color was brighter than pictured but I still love the dress !
Way too short with weirdly shaped—boxy and too short— chest area. Otherwise- it is pretty and I wanted to like it. I returned it.

I'm 5'4" with a small frame and wanted, really really wanted, to like this. It was worth a shot, but it swallowed me up and made me look like I was just wearing a big sack. I got the smallest size and it was still too baggy. It hit me around mid-thigh and everything "fit," but it was the most unflattering shape. I got black. Perhaps in another color you could get away with something baggier/boxier. Again, worth a shot but don't have high expectations! Also was more like a $15 dress than a $30 dress as it was very cheap materials.

评论概述: This item is way too small and the customer service is terrible.
评论详情: When ordering I whipped out my measuring tape to get my measurements so I could choose the best fitting size. I was super disappointed when the product came in because the chest measurements were way off. I tried to see if I could squeeze past the chest because the rest of the dress would have fit, but the chest size was so off that it wasn’t possible. I contacted the seller to see if I could get an exchange or refund, and they told me that they wouldn’t because it’s not their fault. They said that it was my fault that the dress didn’t fit, and they refused to acknowledge that the chest measurements they had on the sizing chart was different from what the dress actually was. Terrible dress and terrible customer service. Luckily I was able to get my money back from Amazon.
Love the embroidery.  Lightweight flowing material. Would buy again.

This dress is sooooo comfy! I purchased the orangey rust looking and it was perfect for Easter Sunday. Embroidery is great! Longer in the back/shorter in front but still able to wear to church and even work. Flatters the body and will be purchasing another color!
I really wanted to love this dress. I sized up thinking maybe it would fit but the bust line went right across the middle of my boobs :(  Cute dresses like this make me wish I had a flatter chest.
The material was rough and scratchy, not something I'd want to wear for more than a few minutes. The length was good and the design was cute. The sleeves were tight around upper arms.

This runs really small, but dang it if it isn't super cute! I bought the smallest size for my 5ft, 85lb 10 year old's birthday. It's adorable on her and fit exactly like the picture. If she was taller or older, this would be a tunic, not a dress....just an FYI. Again, she is 5ft on the dot and it hits her upper middle thigh.
I wore the dress  to the orchestra and had several compliments. I was afraid I might be too old to wear this type of style that really feel it is flattering for any age!
I love the way this dress fits and looks!! I’m 5’2” and it hit above the knee. I’ll definitely be buying more colors! I ordered a 2XL to have a looser fit and I loved the flowiness

I am 7 months/28 weeks pregnant and bought this for my baby shower. I am typically a M/L but sized up based on reviews and my growing belly/bust. I am 5'4" and about 190 with my pregnancy weight, probably around a size 12. I ordered a XL and it fit perfectly! It's flowy, not too short and light weight.

评论概述: Arrived ripped and doused in perfume

When I removed the dress, I found that both side seams between armpit and waist were ripped apart as if the material had been pulled in different directions. The dress looked like the picture, and it seemed to be true to size. But I was annoyed that a company would try to pawn off a visibly-damaged good that looked and smelled as if it had been previously worn.

评论概述: SCAMMED!!!! DID NOT RECEIVE WHAT WAS PICTURED
评论详情: What I received looks like a VERY CHEAP nock off from what the picture shows. First time this has happened to me. Will be returning if I can. Fabric is very thin, no gathers around the waist or sleeves. Lining stops short of skirt length and can clearly be seen through outer skirt layer. Center flowers are yellow instead of orange embroidery. Embroidery overall is the jankiest job I have ever seen. It looks like a beginner embroidery project done with a cheap sewing machine. HORRIBLE and so sad I just bought something from sweat shop workers who probably made $0.10 off of it. WASTE OF MONEY. They had better take it back... Also took three months to arrive. What a waste. Lesson learned to support local businesses or Etsy creators who do real embroidery.
